required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Interventional Study to Assess Efficacy and Safety of Velmanase Alfa in Patients With Alpha Mannosidosis
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Parallel Group, Phase 3 Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Velmanase Alfa in Patients With Alpha Mannosidosis

brief_summary.textblock:
Randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, parallel group study where subjects will receive velmanase alfa or placebo for 24 weeks.
Each subject undergoes to 8 complete visits at the clinic for clinical, laboratory and functional assessments. Study treatment is administered weekly through i.v. infusions

detailed_description.textblock:
A Screening visit (V1) will take place 7±3 days prior to randomization in order to give the subject enough time to consider their participation in the study, to plan the next visits including the long-stay visits at V2, V5 and V8 (long-stay visits as PK and certain tests are performed over more than one day), and to allow the clinic center to complete the evaluation of the eligibility criteria.
Upon confirmation of eligibility, subjects will be randomized to receive weekly i.v. administration of either velmanase alfa 1 mg/kg or placebo.
Thereafter, subjects will undergo weekly visits for administration of study treatment and safety data collection. Clinical, laboratory and functional assessments will be performed at the 4-weekly assessment visits with each subject undergoing a minimum of 8 assessment visits (V1 to V8).

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: double-blind, randomized 2:1 to either velmanase alfa:placebo
study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Change in concentration of serum oligosaccharides
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the efficacy of velmanase alfa compared with placebo after 24 weeks of velmanase alfa treatment as measured by Level of serum oligosaccharides;

primary_outcome.measure: Change in serum level of total immunoglobulin (Ig)G level
primary_outcome.description: Efficacy of velmanase alfa compared with placebo in alpha mannosidosis subjects based on serum levels of total immunoglobulin (Ig)G after 24 weeks of velmanase alfa treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Intracellular level of oligosaccharides in peripheral blood leukocytes
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the efficacy of velmanase alfa compared with placebo after 24 weeks of velmanase alfa treatment as measured by Intracellular level of oligosaccharides accumulated in peripheral blood leukocytes.
To evaluate the efficacy of velmanase alfa compared with placebo after 24 weeks of velmanase alfa treatment as measured by Subclasses of IgG;
Change in number of infections requiring antibiotics and/or hospitalization and/or loss of school/working days

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of PK parameter Maximum plasma Concentration [Cmax]
secondary_outcome.description: To collect additional data on Cmax profile following velmanase alfa treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of PK parameter Maximum plasma Concentration [Cmax]
secondary_outcome.description: To collect additional data on Cmax profile following velmanase alfa treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of PK parameter Area Under the Curve [AUC]
secondary_outcome.description: To collect additional data on AUC profile following velmanase alfa treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of PK parameter Area Under the Curve [AUC]
secondary_outcome.description: To collect additional data on AUC profile following velmanase alfa treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of PK parameter Elimination half-life [t1/2]
secondary_outcome.description: To collect additional data on t1/2 profile following velmanase alfa treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of PK parameter Elimination half-life [t1/2]
secondary_outcome.description: To collect additional data on t1/2 profile following velmanase alfa treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of PK parameter trough concentration (Ctrough)
secondary_outcome.description: To collect additional data on Ctrough profile following velmanase alfa treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of PK parameter trough concentration (Ctrough)
secondary_outcome.description: To collect additional data on Ctrough profile following velmanase alfa treatment

other_outcome.description: Number of AEs will be described for each patient and cumulatively in the safety population
Number of IRRs will be described for each patient and cumulatively in the safety population
Number of ADRs will be described for each patient and cumulatively in the safety population
Change in ADA will be described for each patient and cumulatively in the safety population
Change in NAb levels will be described for each patient and cumulatively in the safety population

other_outcome.measure: Change on Immunoglobuline Type A (IgA) values
other_outcome.description: Change in IgA levels will be described for each patient and cumulatively in the safety population

other_outcome.measure: Change on Immunoglobuline Type M (IgM) values
other_outcome.description: Change in IgM levels will be described for each patient and cumulatively in the safety population
Change in B-cell immunophenotype levels will be described for each patient and cumulatively in the safety population
Change from baseline in motricity tests (climbing test) will be described for each patient
Change from baseline in motricity tests (walking test) will be described for each patient
Change from baseline in respiratory tests (Spirometry) will be described for each patient
Change from baseline in number of psychotic events will be described for each patient
Change from baseline in shoulder mobility will be described for each patient
Change from baseline in electrocardiogram (ECG) PR interval will be described for each patient
Change from baseline in electrocardiogram (ECG) QT interval will be described for each patient
Change from baseline in electrocardiogram (ECG) QRS duration will be described for each patient
Change from baseline in Echocardiogram will be described for each patient
Change from baseline in hearing testing through PTA will be described for each patient

other_outcome.measure: Kaufman-II (Kaurfman Assessment Battery for Children - 2nd Edition)
other_outcome.description: Change in score from baseline in cognitive testing Kaufman-II will be described for each patient

other_outcome.measure: Bayley-III (Bayley Scales of Infant and Toddler Development - 3rd Edition)
other_outcome.description: Change in score from baseline in cognitive testing Bayley-III will be described for each patient

other_outcome.measure: VABS-3 scores (Vineland Adaptive Behavior Scales - 3rd Edition)
other_outcome.description: Change in score from baseline in cognitive testing VABS-3 will be described for each patient
Change from baseline in Peabody Delelopment Motor scale (PMDS-2) scores will be described for each patient

other_outcome.measure: EQ-5D-5L (European Quality of Life Five Dimension Five Level) Questionnaire
other_outcome.description: Change in score from baseline for questionnaire EQ-5D-5L will be described for each patient
Change in score from baseline for CHAQ will be described for each patient
Change in score from baseline for questionnaire MPS Health Assessment Questionnaire will be described for each patient
Change in score from baseline for questionnaire Zarit Burden Interview will be described for each patient

other_outcome.measure: CBCL (Child Behavioral Checklist) or ABCL (Adult Behavioral Checklist) according to age
other_outcome.description: Change in score from baseline for CBCL or ABCL will be described for each patient
Change in score from baseline for PEDI will be described for each patient

other_outcome.measure: PROMIS-SF (Patient-reported Outcomes Measurement Information System Short Forms)
other_outcome.description: Change in score from baseline for PROMIS-SF will be described for each patient

other_outcome.measure: Service-use and cost questionnaire to patient and families
other_outcome.description: Change in score from baseline will be described for each patient
Change from baseline based on a Likert scale (0 to 5)
Change from baseline based on a Likert scale (0 to 5)
